biotools.summary: Meta web server to predict DNA-binding residues for DNA-binding proteins. It integrates the prediction results from six available online web servers: DISIS, DNABindR, BindN, BindN-rf, DP-Bind and DBS-PRED and it solely uses sequence information of proteins.

bioschemas.name: metaDBSite
